amendment.description: Amendment establishes a revenue neutral National Drought Council and a National Drought Policy Action Plan to streamline the federal response in times of drought.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to establish a revenue neutral National Drought Council and a National Drought Policy Action Plan to streamline the federal response in times of drought.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Enyart amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Enyart.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Enyart amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
